reviews.review: nices game and wan take a knife is so hard but this game really nices

I find myself going back to this game from time to time just to polish up my skills and see if I have what it takes to pin down other players or AI-bots with my sniping skills or just simply headshot them at a short distance range. Not to mention that this is the only version of the game that has so many events and game modes that updates regularly even when I'm not aware of it. I definitely cannot say anymore than to recommend this game to gamers old and new to the competitive FPS genre especially if you are in it for eSports or twitch-streaming/gamestreaming purpose. Thumbs up from me.

One of the best competitive games at the time. The game is having a hard time, after getting free to play the cheater problem got worse and valve isn't showing it as much love and care as it needs. The game hasn't got a good update for 6 months now. I hope valve start showing CSGO more love.
